column2: "Benjaminmba
column3: hom mbɔ homho eguaa mfi Jerusalɛm mu! Hom nhɛn akasamu no wɔ Tekoa
column4: na hom nsi frankaa no wɔ Bɛt-hakerem do: na mbusu fi kwaamu afamu rupue

column2: "Zion babaa
column4: mubotwa no akyen."

column2: "Nguanhwɛfo dze hɔn mbowakuw bɛba ne nkyɛn; na wɔabobɔ hɔn asesee wɔ no ho ehyia; hɔn nyinara wobedzidzi wɔ hɔn ananmu."
"Hom nkyer no do sa; hom nsoɛr
column3: na yɛmfow nkɔ ewiaber. Yendue! Na adze resa
column4: ewimbir sunsuma mu atwe."

column2: "Hom nsoɛr
column4: na yɛnkɛsɛɛ n'ahemfie."

column2: "Na mbrɛ dɔm EWURADZE se nye yi
column3: Hom ntow no ndua ngu famu
column4: na hom nhɔr Jerusalɛm ho pempe: kurow a ɔsɛ dɛ wɔkɛsera no nye yi; nhyɛdo ara nko na ɔwɔ no mu."

column2: "Dɛ mbrɛ bura bi puw no nsu ba no
column3: mbrɛ opuw n'emumuyɛ ba ara nye no: wɔtse akakabensɛm nye afofa nka wɔ no mu; ɔyar nye pirakur wɔ m'enyim daa."

column2: "Jerusalɛm
column4: amma me kra aanntwe emmfi wo ho: amma maannyɛ wo amamfo

column2: "Mbrɛ dɔm EWURADZE se nye yi
column3: wobedzi Israel nkaa ho mpɛpɛw kofee dɛ wenyindua ho: dan wo nsa bio kɔ mbirefi no mu dɛ wenyinabatsewnyi."

column2: "Woananom na menkasa na mombɔ hɔn kɔkɔ
column4: hɔn asowa wonntwaa no twatsia
column5: na wonntum nnkyɛn aso nntsie: hwɛ
column6: EWURADZE n'asɛm adan atwetwesidze bi ama hɔn; wonnyi enyigye biara wɔ mu."

column2: "Dɛm ntsi EWURADZE n'ebufuhyew ahyɛ me ma
column3: mesuo mu aberɛ. Hom nhue ngu mbofra no do wɔ ɔbrɔn mu
column4: na mberantsɛ a wɔaboa ano ehyia no do: na wɔbɛkyer okun nye ne yer so
column5: akɔdaa ɔnye nyia oedzi mfe pii."

column2: "Na hɔn efi bɛdandan binom dze
column3: hɔn nhaban nye hɔn yernom nyinara: na mebɛtsen me nsa aka asaase no do mba no
column4: EWURADZE na ɔse."

column2: "Na ofi hɔn mu ekumaba do kesi hɔn mu ɔkɛse mpo do
column3: hɔn nyina dze hɔnho ama enyiber; na ofi nkɔnhyɛnyi do kesi ɔsɔfo mpo do
column4: hɔn nyina twa nkontompɔ."

column2: "Wɔayɛ me man ne pira no edur biarabiara
column4: Asomdwee
column5: asomdwee; ber a asomdwee biara nnyi hɔ."

column2: "Aso hɔn enyi too ber a wɔyɛɛ ekyiwadze no? Dabida
column4: eso wɔammfɛr. Dɛm ntsi na wɔbɔtotɔ wɔ hɔn a wɔtotɔ mu; ber a mobɔtwe hɔn aso no

column2: "Mbrɛ EWURADZE se nye yi
column4: na hom nhwɛ
column5: na hom mbisa akwan dadaw no
column8: na hom benya ahomgye ama hom akra: naaso hɔn dze wɔsee dɛ

column2: "Na misisii hom do aweɔmfo
column4: Hom ntsie akasamu no ne ndze no; naaso hɔn dze wɔsee dɛ

column2: "Dɛm ntsi amanaman e
column4: na mboanofo

column2: "Asaase e
column4: medze mbusu bɛba ɔman yi do
column5: mekyerɛ hɔn ndzeyɛɛ do aba no
column6: osiandɛ wɔannyɛ aso amma me nsɛm

column2: "Ebɛnadze na eduhuam a ofi Seba nye adɔkɔdɔkɔdze a ofi ekyirekyir asaase do no
column3: yɛ ma me? Hom hyew afɔr nnsɔ m'enyi
column4: na hom kum afɔr nnyɛ me fɛw."

column2: "Dɛm ntsi mbrɛ EWURADZE se nye yi
column4: medze fintsidua mobɔto ɔman yi enyim: ama woeefintsifintsiw do egyanom nye mba nyina; na ɔmanyimfo nye ne nyɛnko nyina bowuwu."

column2: "Mbrɛ EWURADZE se nye yi
column4: ɔman fi kwaamu afamu asaase do reba: na wobekenyan ɔman kɛse bi efi asaase etsiwa mu no ho."

column2: "Wokurakura egyen ɔnye mpeaa; wɔyɛ etsiɔdzenfo
column3: na wonnyi ehumbɔbɔr; hɔn ndze wor dɛ po
column4: wɔtsetse mpɔnkɔ do; hɔn mu biara abɔ n'asen do dɛ nyimpa a ɔrokɔ akono

column2: "Yɛatse ne nka; hɛn abaw agow: ahokyer ekitsa hɛn
column3: na yaw a ɔtse dɛ ɔbaa a ɔroko awoo nedze."

column2: "Mma mmfir edzi nnkɔ haban mu
column3: eso mma nnantsew kwan no mu; na ɔtamfo no kitsa afona wɔ hɔ
column4: na hu kɛse etwa ehyia."

column2: "Me man ɔbɔbɔfo e
column4: na yankayankam nso mu: twa sukwadwom dɛ edze rema ɔba kor; sukwadwom wenwen a
column5: osiandɛ awerɛfir mu ara na ɔsɛɛfo no bɛba hɛn do."

column2: "Mayɛ wo abantsentsen nye akoban wɔ me man mu; ama eehu na aasɔ hɔn kwan ahwɛ."
"Hɔn nyinara wɔyɛ etuatsewfo ehiyifo a wɔkasakasa sɛɛ nkorɔfo edzin; boran nye dadze na wɔyɛ: hɔn nyinara wɔyɛ ndzeyɛbɔn."
"Afa no bɔ hyehyeehyew; sumbui no rehyew wɔ gya mu: gyan ara na wɔda ho nan; osiandɛ wonnyiyii emumuyɛfo no nnkɔree."
"Adasa bɛfrɛ hɔn dwetɛ a wɔapow
